Summary: white ball w/redish-orange flickering lights.2 beams(worm looking)shot out as picture was taken.image coming off of ball,green color.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bryan
There were no other sightings in Bryan on or around February 28th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Shape: Cigar, Circle, Cylinder, Fireball, Flash, Sphere, Star-like
divs: sighting detailsi was coming home from a birthday party for a friend @ ozones(restaurant). i stopped @ mcicky d's @ 1:24am. i pulled down my road, which is out in the country(going from west to east)@ about 1:45. as i was coming to my drive way, i notice a ball of light(redish-orange flickering).it was about a mile or two away.as i stopped in front of my drive way, i opened the door and put one foot on my rail and the other foot inside the suv. i took a picture, my finger covered some of the field of view. the object can still be seen, its under the finger in the picture. so, i took another one thinking that i need a better shot. the second picture, my finger is above the object. the object can still be seen. i told myself, i'm going to get beside my suv's hood and use the hood as a stand(for my rt. elbow). before i went around the door, i flashed my bright lights @ this ball of light(flashed about 4 times). as i walked around the driver door, i started to say in my mind: if you are real,come,show me, and give me something to show people. thinking this in my mind, i was placed with my right elbow on top of the hood. very secure, so i could get a motionless picture. as i look at my cell phone display(how you see what you are taking a picture with), the object was close. about 90 to 100 feet away. as i took the picture, four cylinder green beams of light shot out towards me(as the flash went off, i think that the bottom two green lights are a reflection of the top two. because of the hood), as if i took them by suprise. i only saw the ball object in my display, before i took the picture. the flash brought out the other 4 beams. when i saw the beams, it scared me. i ran around the door and jumped in my suv. all i had to do was turn my steering-wheel right and hit the gas and i pulled up to my garage door. i turned the suv off and said to myself: i did not just see what i think i just saw. stund and not knowing whether to get out or stay in my suv. i got up the courage to get out and walk down my drive way and look down the road(to the east, northeast) to see if i could see anything. i did not see anything. went to sleep and went to work the next morning 10:45 a.m., when i got home around 9:45 p.m. i download images from my phone. this is when i realizied that i caught something in a picture that is not normal. as i played with the contrast,tint,& etc... my right shoulder blade began to itch, i noticed a rise in my skin where i was itching. i took off my clothing top, to discover these 1.5cm lumps or bumps that are in a certain area(13 bumps)(1.7 inches above shoulder apex and 2cm medial to medial shoulder blade and a inch from my lateral right side of my body). these bumps are in my epithelium tissue. they are not radiopaque and sometimes send shooting pain into my shoulder blade and threw my under arm(very seldom do they itch). the next night 2\29\2008(took picture and theres the object again--blew it up on computer) i took another picture 3-2-08, caught the object again. these two pictures, the object is position up & down -n- left to right,respectfully. today(3-3-08) my relative came over to by time, before his girl got off work(6:25p.m. till 7:58p.m.). i ask him to take a picture of the sky. aim to the north northeast---make sure that theres nothing in the sky. he calls me @ work when he's on his way to his girl's house. he was startled and said what is that. i ask him, you saw something? yes!!! that gives me the chills. i feel goosebumps--i do too, i responed. i ask him, was there anything in the sky before you took the picture. he said, there was nothing in the sky and then i placed my phone in the dircetion and could see a ball of light. it move out of my camera's view and only caught the end of it(you can see this object with the camera running and can't see it with your naked eyes) he thought it was his radar detector, so he unplugged it. then put the phone up and caught the ball w\a big head and tinacals, attach-but to the side of the ball(zoom up, just like my picture that i caught with the 4 green lights.zoomed-looks the same). haven't down loaded images, yet. he's emailing them to me. he also told me that he felt like crying and that his eyes would start watering, when he took the picture and when he thinks about the image that he saw. we have talked on the phone and both of us feel this crying and an intense feeling of somebody watching or staring at you. we feel these tingles and goosebumps. but the intence urge to cry comes on like in waves. i come home @ 8:17p.m.(3-3-08) and stop in front of my driveway and take a picture. i catch the image again, but it is at a farther distance. i can't zoom up enough to get a clear image. it does look like the ball or object thats been caught on camera. these things are watching me, at lease at home. i haven't tried taking pictures at friends houses yet. if you could please send some investigators to check this out, it's a little spooky. aka:the sightings
